name: The Rock the Paper and the Scissors
name_original: The Rock the Paper and the Scissors
description:
This game is a prototype of Rhythm Ranger made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 32 game jam.

A Western rhythm game!

You are Lefty the bounty hunter. Use your epic skills to take on a deadly crew of train robbers. Your weapon: Rock Paper Scissors!

Controls
  • Left Arrow - Rock
  • Up Arrow - Paper
  • Right Arrow - Scissors
Rules & Tips

Each bandit has a different play style, but they all play according to the rules of the West:

  • When your points are gone, you DIE!
  • You must follow the music!

Watch out! Bandits can use either hand, and some can even regenerate their points with a bandit shout!

An "attack" happens when your hand and one of your opponent's hands are facing each other. Rock beats scissors. Scissors beat paper. Paper beats rock. If you win, your opponent loses a point. If you lose, you lose a point. Whoever loses all their points first is instantly vaporized.
